MaskEnforcer
public
Extension
MaskEnforcer

This extension masks the container by calling Mask::MaskObject that is linked to this extension.  Normally you should not add this extension manually. You should manage objects to be masked via Mask.

Functions
BindToMaskGUIObject
void BindToMaskGUIObject(
ssGUI::GUIObject* maskGUIObj
)

Binds this extension to a Mask extension. maskGUIObj should have Mask attached.

GetMaskGUIObject
ssGUI::GUIObject* GetMaskGUIObject()

Returns the GUI Object that should have Mask attached

SetAllowingCaching
void SetAllowingCaching(
bool allowCaching
)

If true, the masked content will only be calculated only when there's any changes to the size or position or mask (to be changed)

IsAllowingCaching
bool IsAllowingCaching() const

If true, the masked content will only be calculated only when there's any changes to the size or position or mask (to be changed)

DiscardCache
void DiscardCache()
